net.hockeyapp.android
Class UpdateActivity

java.lang.Object
  Activity
      net.hockeyapp.android.UpdateActivity
All Implemented Interfaces:
UpdateActivityInterface, UpdateInfoListener
public class UpdateActivity
extends Activity
implements UpdateActivityInterface, UpdateInfoListener

Description

Activity to show update information and start the download process if the user taps the corresponding button.

Method Detail

onCreate

public void onCreate(Bundle savedInstanceState)
Called when the activity is starting. Sets the title and content view. Configures the list view adapter. Attaches itself to a previously started download task.

Parameters:
savedInstanceState - Data it most recently supplied in onSaveInstanceState(Bundle)

configureView

protected void configureView()
Configures the content view by setting app name, the current version and the listener for the download button.

onRetainNonConfigurationInstance

public java.lang.Object onRetainNonConfigurationInstance()
Detaches the activity from the download task and returns the task as last instance. This way the task is restored when the activity is immediately re-created.

Returns:
The download task if present.

createDownloadTask

protected void createDownloadTask(java.lang.String url,
                                  DownloadFileListener listener)

public void enableUpdateButton()
Enables the download button.

onClick

public void onClick(View v)
Called when the download button is tapped. Starts the download task and disables the button to avoid multiple taps.
